text: Monsters at Work is an American computer-animated streaming television series. It is a spin-off of the Monsters, Inc. franchise, as well as a direct sequel to Monsters, Inc. (2001). It will be the third television series based on properties by Pixar, after Buzz Lightyear of Star Command and Forky Asks a Question; as well as making Monsters, Inc. the second Pixar franchise to spawn its own series. The series made its debut on Disney+ on July 7, 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Monsters, Inc. title: Monsters at Work
